app.title: Transat

features.subtitle: Everything you need for campus life at IMT Atlantique

restaurant.title: Restaurant Menu
restaurant.description: Check the daily menu and never miss your favorite dishes

laundry.title: Laundry Status

services.title: Campus Services
services.description: Access all campus services and stay connected with your community

about.title: Made by Students, for Students
about.subtitle: By the Atlantes, for the Atlantes üêô
about.description: Transat is developed by Plug'IMT, a student association at IMT Atlantique. Our goal is to improve the daily life of students on campus by providing easy access to essential services through a modern, intuitive mobile application.

home.description: Transat is your go-to platform for accessing various services at IMT Atlantique. From checking laundry availability to viewing the restaurant menu, we've got you covered.

laundry.title: Laundry
laundry.description: Check the status of washing machines and dryers on campus.

restaurant.title: Restaurant
restaurant.description: View today's menu and upcoming meals at the campus restaurant.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: View usage statistics for Transat services and API performance.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We're constantly working to improve Transat with new features. Stay tuned for upcoming services and enhancements!

laundry.title: Laundry Service
laundry.description: Check real-time availability of washing machines and dryers on campus.
